text: Inho sahrhoe hastand, ki mo az qavmi Nuh, Hud, Soleh, Lut va Su'ajʙ axʙorasonro ʙar tu, (ej Rasul) hikojat mekunem. Pajomʙaronason ʙo dalelhoi ravsan omadand. Va ʙa on cizho, ki az on pes duruƣ xonda ʙudand, ʙa saʙaʙi sarkasiason va tasdiq nakardanason haqro imon najovardand. Va Alloh ʙar dilhoi kofiron incunin muhr menihad! In cazo va azoʙest az coniʙi Alloh. Va Alloh ʙar onho sitam nakardaast, ʙalki onon xud ʙar xestan sitam kardand
